node.html:
Please provide all assets below:

Asset Dimensions File size (initial load) Max file size (polite load)* File type
Fishbowl Image 720x1624 400kb n/a JPG

Template notes: The 720x1624 is double the pixels of the size it will appear on a mobile where it will run as 360x812. This is to make sure the creative looks nice and crisp on hi-res phone screens. If a double-density version cannot be supplied then single-density 360x812 can be used.

Please provide all assets below:

Asset Dimensions File size (initial load) Max file size (polite load)* File type
Fishbowl Image 720x1624 400kb n/a JPG
Video 360x203
(16:9)		 800kb n/a MP4
  • No sound
  • Video will autoplay and loop

Template notes: The 720x1624 is double the pixels of the size it will appear on a mobile where it will run as 360x812. This is to make sure the creative looks nice and crisp on hi-res phone screens. If a double-density version cannot be supplied then single-density 360x812 can be used.

The aim of the video is to have a short, eye-catching loop of game content that autoplays when the ad loads. We suggest keeping it under 10 seconds to keep the file size down. It should not be supplied double-density because the file size would be too large.

The video will be placed in the same position as on the PSD template.

Please provide all assets below:

Asset Dimensions File size (initial load) Max file size (polite load)* File type
Sticky Leaderboard 320x100 or 320x50 150kb n/a JPG, HTML Zip or Third-Party Tag

There is no PSD template because 320x100 is a standard IAB size.
